# version

**Instance Property**

The version of the SKAdNetwork API.

## Declaration

```swift
var version: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this instance property to the SKAdNetwork version you’re using to sign the view-through ad impression. View-through ads are available starting in version 2.2. For more information about versions and availability, see [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/skadnetwork-release-notes].

## Creating a signature

- **init(sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier:advertisedAppStoreItemIdentifier:adNetworkIdentifier:adCampaignIdentifier:adImpressionIdentifier:timestamp:signature:version:)**: Creates an ad impression object using the supplied values.
- **adNetworkIdentifier**: A string that represents the advertising network’s unique identifier.
- **sourceIdentifier**: A four-digit integer that ad networks define to represent the ad campaign.
- **adCampaignIdentifier**: A number that represents the advertising network’s campaign.
- **advertisedAppStoreItemIdentifier**: The App Store ID of the app that the ad impression advertises.
- **adImpressionIdentifier**: A random value to use for added security.
- **sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier**: The App Store ID of the app that displays the ad.
- **timestamp**: A number that represents the UNIX time, in milliseconds, of the ad impression.
